DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: SEO: Actions available for simple aliases
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Actions available for simple aliases

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: A temporary redirect will be sent to the browser, with the current link to the target resource as the new URL.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: A permanent redirect will be sent to the browser, with the current link to the target resource as the new URL.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: OpenCms will try to load the target resource directly in the current request.
